title: Remix your own Historical Narratives-- Web Literacy Skills for Librarians
notes:
Remix You Own Cultural Narratives -- Web Literacy Skills for Librarians
Saturday, October 29 at 12:30
at Demystify The Web (703)

Thanks for coming to our session!

Here are the presentation slides: https://thimbleprojects.org/mozillalearning/32/

	* Make your own comic strip! h/t Mozilla Learning: https://thimble.mozilla.org/en-US/anonymous/7da89293-a27b-4e9b-9b0e-d610752e89a7/74

	* Make your own printable zine! h/t Matthew Kopel: https://thimbleprojects.org/mkopel/122911/
		* Here's how to fold the paper: http://experimentwithnature.com/03-found/experiment-with-paper-how-to-make-a-one-page-zine/#.WBiRX5MrJ-U


Here is where you can search for OPEN online images! h/t libraries, archives, museums and other culture institutions!

	* Digital Public Library of America: https://dp.la/
	* New York Heritage: https://nyheritage.org/
	* Europeana: http://www.europeana.eu/portal/
	* Digital Culture of Mentropolitan New York: http://dcmny.org/
	* Creative Commons Search: https://search.creativecommons.org/
